channel.description: Recent content in Objects on Neat

item.title: Page
item.description: Page Used to strucutre your page layout into sidebar and main content. Usage Use .o-page to strucutre your page layout into sidebar and main content. Don’t forget to add .js-page-sidebar class for hiding / showing sidebar based on the current screen size. <body class="o-page"> <!-- Notice `.js-page-sidebar` used for toggling sidebar via javascript --> <aside class="o-page__sidebar js-page-sidebar"></aside> <main class="o-page__content"></main> </body>

item.title: Media
item.description: Media Use .o-media to strucutre your media component content. Usage Use .o-media to strucutre your media components. .o-media__img holds the image itself while o-media__content holds the content. You can use spacing utilities to add space between the image and the content. Adam Losert A Web developer and designer <div class="o-media"> <div class="o-media__img u-mr-small"> <div class="c-avatar"> <img class="c-avatar__img" src="/img/avatar.jpeg" alt="Adam"> </div> </div> <div class="o-media__content"> <h5>Adam Losert</h5> <p>A Web developer and designer</p> </div> </div>

item.title: Line
